title: E field of distribution - two semicircles Q and -Q

content.question: Two circles, represented by the dashed lines in the figure, are concentric with their common center at point <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>, as shown in the figure.
